about_the_game:
Do you want to give extra support to the ongoing development of Songs of Conquest? This DLC is for you! It won’t give you any unfair advantages against the AI or other players, but it will give Lavapotion more funds to improve the game.

The supporter upgrade gives you the following:

Main menu golden frame: To remind you of the support and love you showed us.
Wielder pets: They’ll accompany your first Wielder in every game.
Two additional team colours: Pink and dark. So you can slay in style.

By buying this version of the game, you are primarily showing your support for the development of Songs of Conquest and for us, the developers. The listed features are really just added bonuses!
